New Records: Anthony Edwards played his 69th career 30-point game, tying Lakers star Anthony Davis for 15th all time for players 23 years old and below.
Key Match Events: The Minnesota Timberwolves pulled out a comeback win over the Chicago Bulls, 135-119, thanks to a massive 45-24 fourth quarter.
Anthony Edwards led the Timberwolves with 33 points, eight rebounds, and six assists.
Julius Randle scored 22 points and grabbed ten boards.
Rudy Gobert scored 21 points and hauled nine rebounds.
Anthony Edwards scored 13 of his 33 points in the fourth quarter to extend their lead from a single point to 17 in only five minutes.
Post-Match Reflections: Rudy Gobert praised Anthony Edwards' steady improvement, highlighting his enhanced playmaking abilities.
Anthony Edwards expressed his desire for consistent postseason success and acknowledged the need for defensive improvement.
